CustomField.description: Formula to get the maximum approval service level updated logic. Added 25k equal condition
CustomField.formula: IF(Implementationdiscountlevel__c = 1 && Implementation_Service__c = true && Services_Net_Total__c <> 0,1, IF(Implementationdiscountlevel__c = 3 && Implementation_Service__c = true && Services_Net_Total__c >= 25000,3, IF(((Implementation_Service__c = true && (Implementationdiscountlevel__c= 3 || Implementationdiscountlevel__c= 7) && Services_Net_Total__c < 25000) || (Service_Only__c = true && Service_Only_level_no__c = 7 && Services_Net_Total__c <25000) || (Service_Only__c = true && Service_Only_level_no__c = 6) || (Services_Discount_Percentage__c*100) = 100),6, IF(((Implementation_Service__c = true && Implementationdiscountlevel__c =7 && Services_Net_Total__c >= 25000) || (Service_Only__c = true && Service_Only_level_no__c = 7 && Services_Net_Total__c >= 25000)),7,0))))
CustomField.label: Fr maximum service Level
